Player History
Drafted in 14th round, 222nd overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Injured on 4/3/2015 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5-6 weeks...
Released by Houston on 4/16/2015...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 4/21/2015 to a 1-year deal worth $516,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 5/21/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2015, winning 2 games with a 1.10 ERA...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/8/2016 to a 4-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2016, winning 2 games with a 1.69 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2016, going 6-1, 2.68...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2016, going 4-0, 1.36...
